ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p:
The Melbourne WHO Collaborating Centre for Reference and Research on Influenza is supported by the
10.13039/501100003921 Australian Government Department of Health
. The work I have summarized on SARS from my laboratory in the Laboratory of Infectious Diseases,
10.13039/100000060 NIAID
, NIH was supported by the intramural research program of NIAID. It was privilege to work with the small and outstanding group of dedicated and talented scientists at the NIH and the larger group of exceptional collaborators from academia and industry.
